section.name: Test Tage 2009
section.p:
Here the presentation form the Test Tage 2009
Modell getriebene FIT Tests

section.name: Introduction
section.p: XMLFit is a Java and XML based solution to convert testcases written in XML to the FIT HTML table structure.

subsection.name: Functional Overview
subsection.p: This graphic shows the basic functionality of XMLFit. The input is defined in the XML notation and XMLFit transforms this input into the FIT HTML table notation. For more details, see chapter 'Usage'.
